tutorial.title: How to play
tutorial.dragInstruction: Drag a word tile, line it up with the highlighted row or column, and let go.
tutorial.tapInstruction: Tap a word to select it, then tap the row or column where you want to place it.
tutorial.keepGreenHappy: Keep the green <0>A</0> happy to solve both clues.
